00009 #if !defined(Apc_SsStatus_hpp)
00010 #define Apc_SsStatus_hpp
00011 
00012 
00013 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00014 #include <Auxiliary/BitField.hpp>
00015 
00016 
00017 /*  ========================================================================
00018     Supplementary Service Status  [GSM 09.02, 14.7.4], (msap_msg_mn.pr: 966)
00019     SS-Status, containing the following information:
00020     bits 8765: 0000 unused
00021     bit 4 : quiescent/operative indicator
00022     bit 3 : provision indicator
00023     bit 2 : registration indicator
00024     bit 1 : activation indicator 
00025 
00026     ========================================================================*/
00028 class SsStatus {
00029     public:
00031         SsStatus(UINT8 incoming_byte = 0) : m_ss_status(incoming_byte) {}
00032 
00034         UINT8 GetByte() const { return m_ss_status; }
00035 
00037         BOOLEAN IsQuiescentBitSet() const { return m_ss_status & 0x08; }        // bit 4
00039         BOOLEAN IsProvisionBitSet() const { return m_ss_status & 0x04; }        // bit 3
00041         BOOLEAN IsRegistrationBitSet() const { return m_ss_status & 0x02; } // bit 2
00043         BOOLEAN IsActivationBitSet() const { return m_ss_status & 0x01; }       // bit 1
00044 
00045     private:
00046         UINT8 m_ss_status;
00047 };
00048 
00049 
00050 #endif  // Apc_SsStatus_hpp
00051
